summary: I feel like I've been putting off building a public blogroll for a while.  Part of what has helped me to just do it is this post from Keenan about getting rid of their blogroll.  I sympathized with it quite a bit...
title: My Blogroll

summary: Two dogs, a black angus bull and an Amazon parrot are the most memorable animals from my life, for reasons
title: Freckles, The Bull, The Bean, and Cajun

summary: I was reading Veronique's post this afternoon, Just A Small Town Girl, and smiled at her lovely doodles.  But there was one that caught my eye and then, brought a lump to my throat.  It featured a stamp and the words, Post Air Mail...
title: You've Got Mail

summary: A response to a post about giving up on programming, offering insights on the broader value of programming knowledge and the true goal of solving problems over becoming a language expert
title: Re: Why I should give up programming
